title: CECUT
address: Paseo de los Héroes 9350, Zona Urbana Río Tijuana, Tijuana
description: Tijuana's cultural center with art exhibitions and performances. Home to an IMAX Dome theater

title: Parque de la Amistad
address: Av. Paseo Ensenada, Otay Constituyentes, Tijuana
description: A beautiful park in Tijuana, symbolizing friendship and unity with the United States.

title: Popotla Fishing Village
description: A rustic seaside village. Famous for its ocean-to-table experience.

title: Baja Beach Fest
address: Boulevard Benito Juárez, Zona Centro, Rosarito
description: An annual three-day music festival held on the sands of Rosarito.

title: La Bufadora
description: A famous marine geyser and scenic viewpoint.

title: Sierra de San Pedro Mártir
address: Parque Nacional Sierra de San Pedro Mártir, Ensenada
description: A majestic mountain range with forests, wildlife, and Mexico’s premier astronomical observatory.

title: Colorado River Delta
description: A UNESCO-designated biosphere reserve protecting wetlands, desert, and marine ecosystems.
